ailments.name: DEATH
ailments.description: Default altered state. Indicates that a character is dead.

ailments.name: FREEZE
ailments.description: Frozen targets cannot act for 1-3 turns. They have an increased chance of being critically hit.

ailments.name: CONFUSE
ailments.description: Confused targets perform random non-harmful actions for 1-3 turns.

ailments.name: CHARM
ailments.description: Charmed targets act to the benefit of the opposing party for 1-3 turns.

ailments.name: MUTE
ailments.description: Muted targets cannot use skills for 3-5 turns.

ailments.name: SLEEP
ailments.description: Sleeping targets recover a tiny amount of HP and MP during their turn. This lasts until they are hit.

ailments.name: DOOM
ailments.description: Doomed targets have a higher chance of being instantly killed until cleansed.

ailments.name: STUN
ailments.description: Stunned targets cannot act for 1-3 turns. After the effect ends, their hit/evasion rate drops by 1 level.

ailments.name: POISON
ailments.description: Poisoned targets gradually lose HP until cleansed. They won't die from the poison.
